google_cloud_repo.Description: The Google Cloud Repo branch to use.

installer_iso.Description: The RHEL 10 installer ISO to build from.

build_date.Description: Build datestamp used to version the image.

publish_project.Description: A project to publish the resulting image to.

description.Value: Red Hat, Red Hat Enterprise Linux, 10, x86_64 built on ${TIMESTAMP}
description.Description: Description of the image including information such as version, system architecture, build date, etc.

el_release.Description: The Enterprise Linux (EL) release for the iamge

image_family.Description: The name of the image family

is_arm.Description: The system architecture of X86 or ARM

is_byos.Description: If the image is Pay as you Go (PAYG) or Bring your own Service (BYOS)

is_eus.Description: If the image has Extended Update Support(EUS)

is_lvm.Description: If the image supports the Logical Volume Manager (LVM)

is_sap.Description: If the image is RHEL for SAP

license.Description: The base license associated with the image

eus_license.Description: The EUS license if it's an EUS image, base license if not

lvm_license.Description: The LVM license if it's an LVM image, base license if not

rhui_package_name.Description: Name of the RHUI client package

use_dynamic_template.Description: Use the dynamically created templates to create images as part of the RHEL Build Workflow Consolidation path. To remove once the consolidation/refactoring is complete

version_lock.Description: The minor release version for RHEL EUS images
